Name: Franco Russian Punch
Ingredients: 20 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne and lightly stir.
Review: This long refreshing berry and champagne cocktail is a riff on Dick Bradsellâ€™s Russian Spring Punch.
History: Created in January 2014 for Laurent-Perrier by Sean Ware of the London Cocktail Club, London, England.
